sentences.en: At present, fluidized bed and shaft kiln are recognized as reduction equipment.
sentences.cn: 当前最受重视的还原设备是竖炉和流化床.

sentences.en: At present, the more ideally roasting equipment is rotary kiln.
sentences.cn: 目前较为理想的焙烧设备是旋转窑.

sentences.en: Bricks are baked in a kiln.
sentences.cn: 砖是在窑里烧成的.

sentences.en: Bricks are fired in a kiln.
sentences.cn: 砖是在窑中烧制的.

sentences.en: CRAFT SUPPLIES: Whether it’s small items like yarn or big items like a kiln, craft hobbies don’t have to be hard on your wallet.
sentences.cn: 手工艺品： 无论是小到像纱这样的东西，还是大到像窑这样的东西，对于手工艺的兴趣不会让你为荷包发愁。

sentences.en: Drawing major production of electric vehicles , armored cars and full - kiln car parts.
sentences.cn: 主要生产电动拉坯车 、 装窑车及全车零部件.

sentences.en: Food additive - Liquid carbon dioxide ( from lime - Kiln and ammonia plant off gases )
sentences.cn: GB10621-1989食品添加剂液体二氧化碳 ( 石灰窑法和合成氨法 )

sentences.en: He is a very special god worshiped by kiln workers.
sentences.cn: 他可是窑工们祭拜的一位非常特殊的神.

sentences.en: Masonry of Rotary Kiln and Practice of Drying Oven of Limestone Ore.
sentences.cn: 石灰石矿回转窑砌筑及烘炉实践.

sentences.en: Operate kiln to bake clay products to specified hardness.
sentences.cn: 操作窑来烘烤粘土制品到指定的硬度。

sentences.en: Porcelain from a government kiln is usually more costly.
sentences.cn: 官窑出产的瓷器都比较贵.

sentences.en: That morning we fired our first kiln of charcoal.
sentences.cn: 那天上午，我们烧了我们的第一窑木炭。

sentences.en: The furnace shape is specific. The rotary kiln can get good agitation.
sentences.cn: 炉型独特, 炉本体采用旋转式,搅拌及燃烧效果佳.

sentences.en: The kiln man was overjoyed, and sold it to him at once.
sentences.cn: 窑工正是求之不得, 立刻把驴卖给他.

sentences.en: The system uses the heat from waste gases produced in the kiln during the cement-making process both to dry the cement and to heat water in a boiler that drives a turbine to produce electricity.
sentences.cn: 这套设备利用了水泥窑在生产时排放出的废气中的热量，通过热交换的原理，既晾干了水泥熟料，又加热了锅炉里的水，从而形成水蒸气，最后推动涡轮转动发电。

sentences.en: They are charring wood in a kiln.
sentences.cn: 他们正在窑内将木头烧成木炭。

sentences.en: This paper expounds a real - time expert control system for cement rotary kiln.
sentences.cn: 本文简述了一种水泥回转窑 实时 专家控制系统的组成和实现方法.

sentences.en: This paper studys the impact of oxygen - rich combustion technology to shuttle kiln.
sentences.cn: 研究了 富氧 燃烧技术对梭式窑烧成的影响.

sentences.en: Users can set the stroke beginning according to the needs of kiln.
sentences.cn: 用户可根据窑需要配置行程开头.

sentences.en: Villagers build brick kiln, stone kiln ; mine and carry stone material.
sentences.cn: 村民自己建设砖窰 、 石 窰,并且可以人工开采和搬运石材.

words.tran_cn: （砖，石灰等的）[炉窑]窑；炉；干燥炉

trans.tran_en: a special oven for baking clay pots, bricks etc
